title: The Product
description: The Product is a very cool product that can help you with your daily work. It is a very good product that has a lot of features.

hero.subtitle: This is a very cool product that can help you with your daily work.
hero.free_trial: Sign up and start for free.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Reach out to our customer support team.

cta.title: Not Convinced? Try it for yourself!
cta.subtitle: Sign up for a free trial and see how we can help you save time and effort.
cta.note: No credit card required for free trial.

magic_link.preview_text: Log into The Product using your magic link

subscribe_success.subject: Thank you for subscribing to The Product!
subscribe_success.preview_text: You're all set to start using the Product.
subscribe_success.body: We are glad to have you on board. We don't send out a lot of emails, but if there is anything you need, please don't hesitate to reach out to us (replying to this email works very well, there is also a chat bubble on the bottom-right side of the website, that works too).
